sentences.english: America's auto titans are dismantling their global empires.
sentences.chinese: 美國汽車業巨頭的全球汽車王國正經歷着分崩離析。

sentences.english: The giants of management education have laboured mightily to bring forth a molehill.
sentences.chinese: 這些管理學教育界的巨頭們實在是徒勞微功。

sentences.english: Of course, the auto magnates used to be the Masters who ruled the world.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，汽車巨頭們也當過世界統治者。

sentences.english: The software giant dents what could have been mobile domination by Google.
sentences.chinese: 該軟件巨頭得以削弱谷歌在移動應用領域的統治地位。

sentences.english: Ms. Li declined to divulge the value of the investment by Wal-Mart, the world's leading retailer.
sentences.chinese: 李靜拒絕透露沃爾瑪這個世界零售巨頭所投資的數額。

sentences.english: This buy-up of cheap auto assets may help Fiat become a global automotive powerhouse.
sentences.chinese: 這次廉價收購可能幫助菲亞特成爲全球汽車巨頭。

sentences.english: Muckraking journalists denounced the titans of American business as "robber barons".
sentences.chinese: 八卦記者曾將美國工商業巨頭直斥爲“強盜頭目”。

sentences.english: THE giants of the mining industry might be forgiven a little wistfulness .
sentences.chinese: 製造業巨頭們或許又可見到一絲曙光。

sentences.english: And there was even speculation that the oil giant would go bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 坊間甚至一度猜測，這家石油巨頭可能將宣告破產。

sentences.english: The sperm whale does not feed on small fish like other whales.
sentences.chinese: 巨頭鯨不象其它鯨一樣以小魚爲主食。

sentences.english: The fast-food giant also bumped up its full-year outlook.
sentences.chinese: 該快餐業巨頭同時提升了其全年盈利目標。

sentences.english: Foreign wine giant have wine industry in China as the international new strategic position.
sentences.chinese: 洋酒巨頭紛紛將我國當成國際葡萄酒業新的戰略要地。

sentences.english: The three major U. S. auto giant is the cash flow is drying up and in serious danger together.
sentences.chinese: 美國的三大汽車巨頭是現金流枯竭而舉步危艱。

sentences.english: A Russian born business mogul and dropout of Moscow ATI, Roman Abramovich started off making big oil deals.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯商業巨頭，莫斯科國家法律學院的輟學生。

sentences.english: The Internet search giant incurred somewhat higher expenses driven by legal costs.
sentences.chinese: 該搜索巨頭在訴訟費用上產生了高額費用。

sentences.english: The Gull storehouse husband's eruption, lets the Milan team the giants smile blossomed .
sentences.chinese: 古爾庫夫的爆發，讓米蘭隊的巨頭們笑開了花。
